articles.title: Trump announces 25% tariff on India and unspecified penalties for buying Russian oil - AP News
articles.description: President Donald Trump says he'll impose a 25% tariff on goods from India, plus an additional import tax because of India’s purchasing of Russian oil. Trump said Wednesday that India “is our friend” but its “Tariffs are far too high” on U.S. goods. The Republ…
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) President Donald Trump said Wednesday that he will impose a 25% tariff on goods from India, plus an additional import tax because of Indias purchasing of Russian oil.
